summary.Title: Sales Assistant 37h/w to New Yorker in Copenhagen
summary.JobHeadline: Sales Assistant 37h/w to New Yorker in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation: Med mere en 1.200 butikker i 47 lande kan du finde NEW YORKER repræsenteret over hele verden og forsætter sin vækst  som  Young Fashion- virksomhed. Med et team på mere end 23.000 medarbejdere arbejde

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Sales Assistant 37h/w to New Yorker in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Med mere en 1.200 butikker i 47 lande kan du finde NEW YORKER repræsenteret over hele verden og forsætter sin vækst som Young Fashion- virksomhed. Med et team på mere end 23.000 medarbejdere arbejder vi på forkant og lægger stor vægt på et godt samarbejde . Gennem vores passion for mode, vores spontanitet og effektivitet har vi formået at være en del af modeverdenen i mere end 40 år. Bliv en del af vores team!

We are looking for:

Sales Assistant to the New Yorker store in Copenhagen

 

Would you like to join our team?

Main duties:

  • Product management
  • Customer service
  • Sales jobs
  • Cash on delivery
  • Collaboration with other New Yorker departments

Your profile:

  • We would like to see that you are over 18 years of age to work with us.
  • High school education, a degree in the field of commerce is an advantage
  • Experience in customer service
  • Salesmanship
  • Good knowledge of fashion, experience in work related to retail and fashion is an advantage
  • Teamwork-oriented
  • Flexibility and ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment
  • Good knowledge in Danish and English

What we offer:

NEW YORKER offers an attractive work environment with exciting projects where employees are encouraged to show initiative. In addition to interesting offers, an open and dynamic work group and short communication channels awaits you.

Have this caught your interest? We look forward to receiving your online application!

Contract: Sales Assistant full time 37 hours/week. Substitute contract from 01.03.2025 to 01.09.2025.

Information is available from: Store Manager, email: NYDK748@NewYorker.de

Application: Applications are reviewed as soon as they are received. We do not recieve applications via post or email, only by our website: https://jobs.newyorker.de/ Apply now! Application deadline 01.03.2025.

We would love to have you on the team!
